ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Re: Wish list...
ygData.msgSnippet: I was thinking the same thing, BoH is a pretty trade. Another suggestion is red and white scales for our epic. Would love to see more details on the quest if
ygData.messageBody:
I was thinking the same thing, BoH is a pretty trade. Another suggestion
is red and white scales for our epic.

Would love to see more details on the quest if you get a chance.

Tzeetch on Xegony

--- blitz_krieg@... wrote:

What's wrong with having them kill a dragon? :)

I think you'd be selling yourself short with the Tamborine.  <BR>
Depending how "near-uber" they are, they may have all sorts of
Dragon loot laying around unused... I think even a Selo's Drum would be
too little in exchange for this.

It comes off King Tormax (I believe - you said you got it off an Akanon
Quest?) and EQPrices lists it for 25k (low, imo).  I'd ask for
a Breath of Harmony or a Lute of the Howler.

Darkfox
Xegony

The Horn of Hsagra - 13 / 20 piercing, WAR, SHD, ROG, RNG, +35 AC +75 HP
and some other assorted stats.
